Description.Text: L'Angolo Di San Pietro is a luxury 5-star boutique hotel offering modern accommodation near the heart of Rome. Highlights include a rooftop terrace, a stylish lounge bar, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Saint Peter's Square. The area surrounding the Vatican City is extremely wealthy and features a high concentration of hotels, cafes and shops. Nearby places of interest include Saint Peter's Square and Basilica, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Sistine Chapel, with its magnificent Renaissance frescos by artists including Michelangelo and Botticelli. Roma San Pietro train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel is housed in a small mid-rise building with shuttered windows. Facilities include a rooftop terrace offering spectacular views of Saint Peter's Basilica, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Colonna Deluxe rooms are decorated in a modern style with contemporary furniture design and prominent use of mirrors. Amenities include a 52-inch flat-screen satellite TV, iPod dock, complimentary mini-bar, air-conditioning and an en-suite bathroom with luxury toiletries. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. It also offers a free butler service and complimentary use of a Vespa bike and Fiat car. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
